# Create an App Store Version Phased Release

**Web Service Endpoint**

Enable phased release for an App Store version.

## Managing Phased Releases

- **Modify an App Store Version Phased Release**: Pause or resume a phased release, or immediately release an app.

items.description: Pause or resume a phased release, or immediately release an app.
